thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: I have ordered my frames for the last three years from Frames Direct. This has been the worst experience ever. The representatives gave me the run around as it related to a pair of sunglasses that I had chose to order, although the sunglasses were out of stock I never received a phone call, I was emailed. Next I had to contact Frames Direct directly only to find out that the individual that was handling my order was not in the office.
